description: Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is seeking to procure Alteryx licenses. The objective of this acquisition is to obtain a comprehensive suite of Alteryx tools and licenses for the Corporation’s internal business strategies and processes.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement:**
**Title:** Alteryx Licenses
**Reference Number:** 2022-3589 (PW 22-01005306)
**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Organization:** Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation
**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

**Introduction:**
The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is seeking to procure Alteryx licenses for its operations. The procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (CANADA-UK TCA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Estimated Contract Value:**
The estimated contract value is $1,345,830.

**Procurement Method:**
This procurement is an open tendering process to enter into a non-exclusive contract.

**Term of Resulting Contract:**
It is anticipated that the term of the resulting contract will be for three years. The CDIC intends to issue a notice of intended procurement prior to the expiry of the term.

**Requirements:**
Bidders must be authorized resellers of Alteryx licenses. Quotations may be submitted in either English or French.

**Evaluation Process:**
Quotations will be examined based on the following criteria: completeness and compliance to the mandatory requirements (pass/fail basis), evaluation of financial offer (100%), and ranking of bidders.

**Trade Agreement:**
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: CETA, CANADA-UK TCA, and CFTA.

**Notice:**
This notice constitutes a notice of intended procurement and summary notice under CETA and CANADA-UK TCA, as well as a tender notice under CFTA. Interested suppliers are encouraged to submit their quotes.

**Submission:**
Questions and quotations should be submitted to procurement@cdic.ca. The closing date for the submission of quotes is September 26, 2022, at 12:00 PM EST.

**Language:**
Quotations may be submitted in either English or French.

The rewritten entry is under 400 words. The rephrased text is concise and follows a clear structure.  Markdown formatting has been used for better readability.

### Important contact information
- [name] Pelletier, Isabelle
- [email] ipelletier@cdic.ca
